forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 13C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 54F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low near 45F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 13C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High around 55F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 46F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 7C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 44F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 7C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 43F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 54F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 44F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the morning, then clouds lingering in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 56F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 7C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 43F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 61F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.
